explains: n. 联合政府；联合体，联盟；联合，结合

sentences.en: His policy risks fracturing the coalition.
sentences.cn: 他的政策有分裂联盟的危险。

sentences.en: Since June the country has had a coalition government.
sentences.cn: 从6月起，这个国家有了一个联合政府。

sentences.en: It will be able to put together a governing coalition.
sentences.cn: 它将能够组建一个执政联盟。
